name: InclusivenessAnalyzer
helpMarkDown: Make your code inclusive! This extension checks code and docs on every commit for offensive and exclusive terms like blacklist and suggests alternatives.
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: failBuildOnNonInclusiveTerm
inputs.label: Fail task if non-inclusive terms are found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fails the step if a non-inclusive term is found.

inputs.name: excludeUnchangedFiles
inputs.label: Limit scan to files changed in the latest commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only scan files added or modified in last commit when checkout step has 'with: fetch-depth: 2' configured.

inputs.name: excludeFromScan
inputs.label: Files and directory to exclude from scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of file patterns to exclude from analysis.

inputs.name: excludeTerms
inputs.label: Non-inclusive terms to exclude from scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of non-inclusive terms to exclude from analysis.
